products.name: Daily Multivitamin
products.description: Comprehensive vitamin and mineral supplement for daily wellness.
products.ingredients: Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Vitamin E, B-complex vitamins, minerals
products.usage: Take one capsule daily with food
benefits: Fills nutritional gaps in your diet

products.name: Omega-3 Fish Oil
products.description: High-quality omega-3 fatty acids for heart and brain health.
products.ingredients: Fish oil concentrate, EPA, DHA, gelatin, glycerin, purified water
products.usage: Take one softgel twice daily with meals
benefits: Promotes brain function and cognitive health

products.name: Protein Powder
products.description: Plant-based protein powder for muscle recovery and growth.
products.ingredients: Pea protein, rice protein, hemp protein, natural flavors, stevia
products.usage: Mix one scoop with 8-10 oz of water or plant milk
benefits: Provides 25g of complete plant protein per serving
